task.title: Analysis language constraint
task.shortdesc: Add informal constraint definition in human readable text.

step.cmd: Select the table row for the template class that is context for the new constraint.
To add a new constraint, right-click on the table row and select Add UMLConstraint

Select the table row with the new constraint (it has the general label 'Constraint'), as shown here. Enter the constraint name, select 'Analysis' from the Language pull-down list, and enter the constraint body.

taskbody.result: This is an example of a completed constraint within the Neonatal ICU Encounter Activity class.
